record.author: The scribe of this copy of the Beyeren armorial is unknown. The orignal armorial was made by [[:w:nl:Claes_Heynensoon|Claes Heynensoon]] / heraut Beyeren voorheen Gelre (ca. 1345-1414) {{Creator:Claes Heynenzoon}}
record.date: This copy armorial is from ca. 1600. The [[:w:nl:Wapenboek_Beyeren|original]] is from 1405.
record.description: Page 73 from a copy of the Beyeren armorial / [[:w:nl:Wapenboek_Beyeren|Wapenboek Beyeren]] from ca. 1600. The original Beyeren armorial from 1405 can be viewed at the [https://www.kb.nl/themas/middeleeuwen/wapenboek-beyeren-1405 website of the KB]
